soft: You are allowed to rest.
Not everything needs a response.
Not everything that mattered left evidence
Certain answers wait for stillness
You handled things better than you think
I see your effort, I appreciate it
The night doesn't rush
I'm glad you're here.
Not every truth needs a witness.
You don't need to have everything figured out right now.
Someone would be relieved to know you're okay.
You don't have to do this alone.
It's okay to take a break.
You're doing what you can, I'm proud of you.
This won't always feel heavy.
You're not behind.
It's okay to start again, try again. Your effort counts.
Things won't stay unclear forever.
Take your time.
This all will ease with time.
I believe in you, always.
You've come farther than you think.
You don't need to decide yet.
You're doing things right. Trust me.
You're doing enough, even now.
You’re not meant to understand everything at once.
This isn't the end of the story
Let this pass.
You can leave your worries right here.
The tide will move on, on its own.
You're doing a good job
I miss you
You got this

mysterious: Timing knows more than we do.
warm: You’re doing better than you think.
